text: Teresa Heinz Kerry (born October 5, 1938) is a Portuguese-American businesswoman and philanthropist. She was born in Maputo, Mozambique to Portuguese parents. She is the wife of United States Senator John Kerry. She was previously married to former U.S. senator H. John Heinz III, until his death. She is a naturalized American citizen. She has breast cancer.Teresa Heinz has breast cancer == References == Category:Businesspeople from Pittsburgh Category:John Kerry Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Writers from Pittsburgh Category:Portuguese writers Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maputo
title: Teresa Heinz
